eduversum.name: Itools
eduversum.description: itools is a collection of command line tools. itools contains Islamic Hijri calendar and prayer time tools. The following commands are available:[ul] [li]ical: Displays a Hijri calendar.[/li] [li]idate: is an extensive Hijri/Gregorian date converter.[/li] [li]ipraytime: Prayer times and Qibla calculator and schedule table generator.[/li] [li]ireminder: Prayer time reminder (Perl-Script).[/li] [/ul]
